mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.station_id AS "stationId", a.name AS "name", a.head_pic AS "headPic", a.id_card AS "idCard", a.id_card_pic AS "idCardPic", a.life_pic AS "lifePic", a.job_pic AS "jobPic", a.phone AS "phone", a.province_code AS "provinceCode", a.city_code AS "cityCode", a.area_code AS "areaCode", a.address AS "address", a.sex AS "sex", a.nation AS "nation", a.birth_date AS "birthDate", a.status AS "status", a.app_login_password AS "appLoginPassword", a.job_nature AS "jobNature", a.job_status AS "jobStatus", a.work_time AS "workTime", a.email AS "email", a.education AS "education", a.height AS "height", a.weight AS "weight", a.marry_status AS "marryStatus", a.native_province_code AS "nativeProvinceCode", a.in_job_time AS "inJobTime", a.job_level AS "jobLevel", a.description AS "description", a.remark AS "remark", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS "id", a.station_id AS "stationId", a.name AS "name", a.head_pic AS "headPic", a.id_card AS "idCard", a.life_pic AS "lifePic", a.phone AS "phone", a.address AS "address", a.sex AS "sex", a.nation AS "nation", a.birth_date AS "birthDate", a.email AS "email", a.height AS "height", a.weight AS "weight", a.native_province_code AS "nativeProvinceCode", a.description AS "description" FROM tech_info a WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT a.id AS "id", a.station_id AS "stationId" FROM tech_info a WHERE a.phone = #{phone} AND a.del_flag='0'

SELECT a.id AS id, a.head_pic AS imgUrlHead, a.phone AS techPhone, a.name AS techName, a.sex AS techSex, a.birth_date AS techBirthDate, a.address AS addrDetailInfo, a.id_card AS techIdCard, a.id_card_pic AS imgUrlCard, a.email AS techEmail, a.height AS techHeight, a.weight AS techWeight, a.native_province_code AS techNativePlaceValue, a.province_code AS provinceCode, a.city_code AS cityCode, a.area_code AS areaCode, a.nation AS techNationValue, a.description AS experDesc, a.life_pic AS imgUrlLife, a.job_status AS jobStatus, a.app_login_password AS password FROM tech_info a WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND a.station_id = #{stationId} AND a.id != #{id} ORDER BY convert(a.name using gbk) asc
SELECT a.id,a.name FROM ser_skill_info a WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND a.org_id = #{orgId} ORDER BY create_date DESC

SELECT a.id,a.name FROM basic_service_station a WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND a.org_id = #{orgId}
${sqlMap.dsf} ORDER BY a.create_date DESC
mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.station_id AS "stationId", a.station_id AS "stationId1", b.city_code AS "stationCityCode", a.name AS "name", a.head_pic AS "headPic", a.id_card AS "idCard", a.id_card_pic AS "idCardPic", a.life_pic AS "lifePic", a.job_pic AS "jobPic", a.phone AS "phone", a.province_code AS "provinceCode", a.city_code AS "cityCode", a.area_code AS "areaCode", a.address AS "address", a.sex AS "sex", a.nation AS "nation", a.birth_date AS "birthDate", a.status AS "status", a.app_login_password AS "appLoginPassword", a.job_nature AS "jobNature", a.job_status AS "jobStatus", a.work_time AS "workTime", a.email AS "email", a.education AS "education", a.height AS "height", a.weight AS "weight", a.marry_status AS "marryStatus", a.native_province_code AS "nativeProvinceCode", a.in_job_time AS "inJobTime", a.job_level AS "jobLevel", a.description AS "description", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.select: select skill_id AS id from ser_skill_tech where tech_id=#{reqId} AND del_flag = '0'

select tech_id AS techId, DATE_FORMAT(start_time,'%T') AS startTimeStr, DATE_FORMAT(end_time,'%T') AS endTimeStr, GROUP_CONCAT(week) AS week from tech_work_time where tech_id=#{reqId} AND del_flag = '0' GROUP BY tech_id,start_time,end_time

select a.week AS week, a.start_time AS startTime, a.end_time AS endTime, a.tech_id AS techId, a.id AS id from tech_work_time a LEFT JOIN tech_info b on a.tech_id=b.id where a.tech_id=#{id} AND a.del_flag = '0'
ORDER BY a.week

select id AS id,relation AS relation,member_name AS memberName, member_phone AS memberPhone,member_company AS memberCompany, member_job AS memberJob from tech_family_members where tech_id=#{reqId} AND del_flag = '0'

select id AS id,relation AS relation,member_name AS memberName, member_phone AS memberPhone,member_company AS memberCompany, member_job AS memberJob from tech_family_members where tech_id=#{id} AND del_flag = '0'
SELECT id,name FROM basic_service_station WHERE city_code = (SELECT city_code from basic_service_station WHERE id= #{reqId}) AND del_flag = '0'

select count(*) from order_info a left join order_dispatch b on a.id = b.order_id where a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and b.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and b.tech_id = #{id} and finish_time>=NOW() AND order_status != 'cancel'

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.station_id AS "stationId", a.name AS "name", a.head_pic AS "headPic", a.id_card AS "idCard", a.id_card_pic AS "idCardPic", a.life_pic AS "lifePic", a.job_pic AS "jobPic", a.phone AS "phone", a.address AS "address", a.sex AS "sex", a.nation AS "nation", a.birth_date AS "birthDate", a.status AS "status", a.app_login_password AS "appLoginPassword", a.job_nature AS "jobNature", a.job_status AS "jobStatus", a.work_time AS "workTime", a.email AS "email", a.education AS "education", a.height AS "height", a.weight AS "weight", a.marry_status AS "marryStatus", a.remark AS "remark", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM tech_info a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.phone = #{phone}

SELECT a.id AS "id", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.station_id AS "stationId", a.name AS "name", a.head_pic AS "headPic", a.id_card AS "idCard", a.id_card_pic AS "idCardPic", a.life_pic AS "lifePic", a.job_pic AS "jobPic", a.phone AS "phone", a.address AS "address", a.sex AS "sex", a.nation AS "nation", a.birth_date AS "birthDate", a.status AS "status", a.app_login_password AS "appLoginPassword", a.job_nature AS "jobNature", a.job_status AS "jobStatus", a.work_time AS "workTime", a.email AS "email", a.education AS "education", a.height AS "height", a.weight AS "weight", a.marry_status AS "marryStatus", a.remark AS "remark", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM tech_info a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tech_info( id, org_id, station_id, name, head_pic, id_card, id_card_pic, life_pic, job_pic, phone, province_code, city_code, area_code, address, sex, nation, birth_date, status, app_login_password, job_nature, job_status, work_time, email, education, height, weight, marry_status, native_province_code, in_job_time, job_level, description, remark, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orgId}, #{stationId}, #{name}, #{headPic}, #{idCard}, #{idCardPic}, #{lifePic}, #{jobPic}, #{phone}, #{provinceCode}, #{cityCode}, #{areaCode}, #{address}, #{sex}, #{nation}, #{birthDate}, #{status}, #{appLoginPassword}, #{jobNature}, #{jobStatus}, #{workTime}, #{email}, #{education}, #{height}, #{weight}, #{marryStatus}, #{nativeProvinceCode}, #{inJobTime}, #{jobLevel}, #{description}, #{remark}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tech_info SET org_id = #{orgId}, station_id = #{stationId}, name = #{name}, head_pic = #{headPic}, id_card = #{idCard}, id_card_pic = #{idCardPic}, life_pic = #{lifePic}, job_pic = #{jobPic}, phone = #{phone}, province_code = #{provinceCode}, city_code = #{cityCode}, area_code = #{areaCode}, address = #{address}, sex = #{sex}, nation = #{nation}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, status = #{status}, app_login_password = #{appLoginPassword}, job_nature = #{jobNature}, job_status = #{jobStatus}, work_time = #{workTime}, email = #{email}, education = #{education}, height = #{height}, weight = #{weight}, marry_status = #{marryStatus}, native_province_code = #{nativeProvinceCode}, in_job_time = #{inJobTime}, job_level = #{jobLevel}, description = #{description}, remark = #{remark}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE tech_info SET org_id = #{orgId}, station_id = #{stationId}, name = #{name}, head_pic = #{headPic}, id_card = #{idCard}, id_card_pic = #{idCardPic}, life_pic = #{lifePic}, job_pic = #{jobPic}, phone = #{phone}, province_code = #{provinceCode}, city_code = #{cityCode}, area_code = #{areaCode}, address = #{address}, sex = #{sex}, nation = #{nation}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, status = #{status}, app_login_password = #{appLoginPassword}, job_nature = #{jobNature}, job_status = #{jobStatus}, work_time = #{workTime}, email = #{email}, education = #{education}, height = #{height}, weight = #{weight}, marry_status = #{marryStatus}, native_province_code = #{nativeProvinceCode}, in_job_time = #{inJobTime}, job_level = #{jobLevel}, description = #{description}, remark = #{remark}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tech_info SET life_pic = #{lifePic}, job_pic = #{jobPic}, remark = #{remark}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE tech_info SET email = #{email}, education = #{education}, height = #{height}, weight = #{weight}, marry_status = #{marryStatus}, native_province_code = #{nativeProvinceCode}, in_job_time = #{inJobTime}, job_level = #{jobLevel}, description = #{description}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE tech_info SET org_id = #{orgId}, station_id = #{stationId}, name = #{name}, head_pic = #{headPic}, id_card = #{idCard}, id_card_pic = #{idCardPic}, life_pic = #{lifePic}, job_pic = #{jobPic}, phone = #{phone}, province_code = #{provinceCode}, city_code = #{cityCode}, area_code = #{areaCode}, address = #{address}, sex = #{sex}, nation = #{nation}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, status = #{status}, app_login_password = #{appLoginPassword}, job_nature = #{jobNature}, job_status = #{jobStatus}, work_time = #{workTime}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS id, a.head_pic AS imgUrlHead, a.phone AS techPhone, a.name AS techName, a.sex AS techSex, a.birth_date AS techBirthDate, a.address AS addrDetailInfo, a.id_card AS techIdCard, a.id_card_pic AS imgUrlCard, a.email AS techEmail, a.height AS techHeight, a.weight AS techWeight, a.native_province_code AS techNativePlaceValue, a.province_code AS provinceCode, a.city_code AS cityCode, a.area_code AS areaCode, a.nation AS techNationValue, a.description AS experDesc, a.life_pic AS imgUrlLife, a.app_login_password AS password FROM tech_info a WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND a.id = #{id}

SELECT a.id AS id, a.head_pic AS imgUrlHead, a.phone AS techPhone, a.name AS techName, a.sex AS techSex, a.birth_date AS techBirthDate, a.address AS addrDetailInfo, a.id_card AS techIdCard, a.id_card_pic AS imgUrlCard, a.email AS techEmail, a.height AS techHeight, a.weight AS techWeight, a.native_province_code AS techNativePlaceValue, a.province_code AS provinceCode, a.city_code AS cityCode, a.area_code AS areaCode, a.nation AS techNationValue, a.description AS experDesc, a.life_pic AS imgUrlLife, a.job_status AS jobStatus, a.app_login_password AS password FROM tech_info a WHERE a.del_flag = '0' AND a.phone = #{username}
